channel.title: Help with sound on EasyRSC
channel.description:
I've resolved most of my issues with easyrsc (or given up on some) but I still can't get sound working. I literally downloaded it, opened the server, opened the client, and started playing and there was no sound so I didn't screw it up some how. Is there something I need to do to activate the sound?
Thanks for the help!
-Ethan :)
EDIT: By the way, I made sure the sound was up. (I played some songs) I tried several things ingame to test the sound too. Didn't work =/ - And yes I have the sound effects option on :P

item.title: Help with sound on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

It wasn’t added for some reason… I might try to figure it out later unless somebody already knows and is willing to tell you.

Read full topic
